# Setup

1. Clone the repository: <br>
   ```
   git clone https://github.com/m-miler/django_stock_app.git
   ```
2. Create a .env file with variables: <br>
   ```
   DEBUG=True
   DEVELOPMENT=True
   ```
3. Install docker and docker-compose then run in project file:
   ```
   $ docker-compose up
   ```

4. Application will be available at:
   ```
   localhost: 127.0.0.1.8080
   login: admin
   passowrd: admin
   ```
